  • October 8, 2020 - Authors: Markus Hofmarcher, Marius-Constantin Dinu

    Align-RUDDER: Learning from Few Demonstrations by Reward Redistribution

    Reinforcement

    Demonstrations

    Minecraft

    We present Align-RUDDER an algorithm which learns from as few as two demonstrations. It does this by aligning demonstrations and also speeds up learning by reducing the delay in reward.
